aws_load_balancer_policy.description: Provides a load balancer policy, which can be attached to an ELB listener or backend server.

load_balancer_name.description: The load balancer on which the policy is defined.

policy_name.description: The name of the load balancer policy.

policy_attribute.description: Policy attribute to apply to the policy.

policy_name.description: The name of the stickiness policy.

policy_type_name.description: The policy type of the policy.

load_balancer_name.description: The load balancer on which the policy is defined.
